record.title: ORDERS FOR THURSDAY, JUNE 14, 2007

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that when the Senate completes its business today, it stand adjourned until 9:30 a.m., Thursday, June 14; that on Thursday, following the prayer and the pledge, the Journal of proceedings be approved to date, the morning hour be deemed expired, and the time for the two leaders be reserved for their use later in the day, and the Senate then resume consideration of H.R. 6, the comprehensive energy legislation.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
